Series 7: Event programs and related items
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
Long Island College Hospital School of Nursing Alumnae Association records
Sub-series 7.4: Prospect Heights Hospital School of Nursing commencements
Sub-series 7.4: Prospect Heights Hospital School of Nursing commencements

One folder containing five programs for the commencements and capping ceremonies of the Prospect Heights Hospital School of Nursing, dating from 1960 to 1962. One program for the 1964 joint commencement ceremony of the Prospect Heights Hospital Pavilion School of Nursing and the LICH School of Nursing can be found in Sub-series 7.1: Commencements.
